titles.title: Rural Wireless Access Act of 2017
Rural Wireless Access Act of 2017

A bill to require the Federal Communications Commission to establish a methodology for the collection by the Commission of information about commercial mobile service and commercial mobile data service, and for other purposes.
Rural Wireless Access Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Rural Wireless Access Act of 2017
This bill requires the Federal Communications Commission to establish a consistent methodology for its collection of coverage data about the available speed tiers and performance characteristics of commercial mobile and data service for the Universal Service program or any similar programs.
